subject: Bowling
lead_paragraph: A 78-year-old legally blind man from northwest Iowa has bowled a perfect game. The Alta resident Dale Davis had 12 consecutive strikes for a 300 score Saturday night during league play. Davis has limited peripheral vision but cannot see straight ahead.
